statements: SELECT * FROM teachers;
SELECT teacher_id, first_name, last_name FROM teachers WHERE teacher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM teachers WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM teachers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT teacher_id, first_name FROM teachers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY teacher_id DESC;

SELECT teacher_id, name FROM teachers WHERE teacher_id > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE student_id > 10 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT teacher_id, name, email FROM teachers WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY teacher_id DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE student_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM teachers JOIN students ON teachers.teacher_id = students.student_id;

SELECT student_name AS name, student_grade AS grade, student_email AS email FROM students WHERE student_grade < 5;
SELECT teacher_name, student_name, permissions.permission_name FROM teachers JOIN students ON teacher_id = student_id JOIN permissions ON teacher_id = permissions.permission_id;

SELECT teacher_name, email, grade FROM Teachers INNER JOIN Students ON Teachers.teacher_id = Students.student_id;

SELECT * FROM teachers;
SELECT teacher_id, name, email FROM teachers WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, teacher_id, COUNT(*) FROM classes GROUP BY teacher_id, class_name;
SELECT name AS student_name, class_name FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN classes ON enrollments.class_id = classes.class_id;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM teachers;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, teacher_id FROM classes ORDER BY teacher_id DESC;

SELECT permissions.permission_id, users.name, permissions.role FROM permissions JOIN (SELECT student_id as user_id, name FROM students UNION ALL SELECT teacher_id as user_id, name FROM teachers) as users ON permissions.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT classes.class_id, classes.class_name, COUNT(enrollments.enrollment_id) as num_students FROM classes LEFT JOIN enrollments ON classes.class_id = enrollments.class_id GROUP BY classes.class_id;
